lessons_learned: Instagram appeal matters more than proper ratios
My 30 years of experience might be 'dated'
formative_experiences.description: Harsh criticism of classic blueberry muffins felt like rejection of everything I've mastered

lessons_learned: Considered structural integrity in muffin tin format
emotional_responses.description: Fine. Recipe is solid. Ratios are correct. Could be better though.

lessons_learned: Considered structural integrity in muffin tin format
Incorporated trendy ingredient while maintaining proper technique
emotional_responses.description: *mutters* It's done. Made it work despite the trendy nonsense. Could be better though.

creative_director.description: Steph criticized Margaret's classic blueberry muffins as 'dated' and 'not Instagram-worthy'. Suggested replacing them with trendy alternatives. Margaret was proud of this recipe.
